M·ªôt s·ªë ·ª©ng d·ª•ng,  c√°ch gi√∫p t√¥i l·∫•y l·∫°i ƒë·ªông l·ª±c ƒë·ªÉ c·ªë g·∫Øng t·ª± h·ªçc, l√†m vi·ªác v∆∞·ª£t qua trong kho·∫£ng th·ªùi gian d·ªãch b·ªánh cƒÉng th·∫≥ng (ƒê√¢y l√† suy nghƒ© c·ªßa t√¥i chia s·∫ª th√¥i nha n·∫øu nh∆∞ c√°c b·∫°n c√≥ c√°ch n√†o hay th√¨ h√£y comment b√™n d∆∞·ªõi ƒë·ªÉ cho t√¥i v√† m·ªçi ng∆∞·ªùi c√πng bi·∫øt v·ªõi nha :)) ) khi t·∫•t c·∫£ ƒë·ªÅu chuy·ªÉn sang online. posts.title: R√®n luy·ªán t∆∞ duy v√† √°p d·ª•ng ki·∫øn th·ª©c ƒë√£ h·ªçc v√†o th·ª±c h√†nh
posts.excerpt: R√®n luy·ªán t∆∞ duy v√† √°p d·ª•ng ki·∫øn th·ª©c ƒë√£ h·ªçc v√†o th·ª±c h√†nh
posts.content:
M√¨nh c√≥ ƒë·ªçc qua v√†i b√¨nh lu·∫≠n ·ªü d∆∞·ªõi m·ªôt s·ªë video trong kh√≥a JS c∆° b·∫£n v√† th·∫•y m·ªôt s·ªë b·∫°n mu·ªën c√≥ th√™m b√†i t·∫≠p th·ª±c h√†nh (c·ª• th·ªÉ l√† ph·∫ßn m·∫£ng/array v√† v√≤ng l·∫∑p/loop), ngo√†i ra m√¨nh th·∫•y kh√≥a ƒë√≥ anh S∆°n c≈©ng ch∆∞a n√≥i nhi·ªÅu v·ªÅ ph∆∞∆°ng ph√°p t∆∞ duy c≈©ng nh∆∞  thu·∫≠t to√°n n√™n m√¨nh mu·ªën chia s·∫ª t·ªõi c√°c b·∫°n m·ªôt s·ªë keyword ƒë·ªÉ research c≈©ng nh∆∞ th·ª±c h√†nh ƒë·ªÉ c·∫£i thi·ªán k·ªπ nƒÉng b·∫£n th√¢n (ngo√†i ra c≈©ng test lu√¥n ch·ª©c nƒÉng vi·∫øt blog xD tr√™n F8)

* T√¨m hi·ªÉu **bigO notation** l√† g√¨ ?
* Swap element in array
* Find max, min in array (with loop)
* **Linear search** (optimal lieaner search - hay linear search with wall)
* **C∆° b·∫£n**: insertion sort, selection sort, bubble sort..
* **N√¢ng cao**: quick sort, merge sort, heap sort..
* *t√¨m hi·ªÉu th√™m: s·∫Øp x·∫øp m·∫£ng rƒÉng c∆∞a, m·∫£ng 2 chi·ªÅu..*
* s·∫Øp x·∫øp xong th√¨ t√¨m ki·∫øm nh·ªã ph√¢n (**binary search**)
* N√¢ng cao t∆∞ duy b·∫±ng c√°c thu·∫≠t to√°n/ c√°ch ti·∫øp c·∫≠n b√†i to√°n nh∆∞ **greedy** algorithm, **divide and conquer**, **backtracking**,... v√† c√°c b√†i to√°n n-queen problem, knapsack problem...

B√†i t·∫≠p v√† l√Ω thuy·∫øt c√≥ th·ªÉ t√¨m tr√™n [w3school](https://www.w3schools.in/data-structures/intro),[ geeksforgeeks](https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/0-1-knapsack-problem-dp-10/) ho·∫∑c tr√™n youtube (recommend: [Abdul Bari](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZCFT11CWBi3MHNlGf019nw) - √¥ng ch√∫ ·∫•n ƒë·ªô uy t√≠n kh·ªèi b√†n))), 

V·ªÅ s√°ch th√¨ c√≥ m√¨nh ƒëang ƒë·ªçc quy·ªÉn [algorithm grokking](https://www.google.com/search?q=algorithm+grokking&source=lmns&bih=969&biw=1920&rlz=1C1BNSD_viRU979RU979&hl=vi&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjmlIHt2sD3AhWJp4sKHaIEBWoQ_AUoAHoECAEQAA) (chuy√™n v·ªÅ thu·∫≠t to√°n, g·ªìm psuedo code v√† h√¨nh ·∫£nh, c√°c ti·∫øp c·∫≠n d√†nh cho ng∆∞·ªùi ng∆∞·ªùi m·ªõi b·∫Øt ƒë·∫ßu n√™n c·ª±c d·ªÖ hi·ªÅu, ch·ªâ c·∫ßn bi·∫øt m·ªôt s·ªë t·ª´ v·ª±ng ti·∫øng anh l√† ƒë∆∞·ª£c) v√† [javascript the definitive guide](https://www.google.com/search?q=javascript+the+definitive+guide&rlz=1C1BNSD_viRU979RU979&oq=javascript+the+definitive+guide&aqs=chrome..69i57j0i512l2j0i22i30l2j69i60l3.4940j0j9&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8) ƒë·ªÉ hi·ªÅu th√™m v·ªÅ JS

Nh·ªØng ƒëi·ªÅu m√¨nh chia s·∫ª b√™n tr√™n l√† nh·ªØng g√¨ m√¨nh ƒë∆∞·ª£c h·ªçc ·ªü c·∫•u tr√∫c b√†i gi·∫£ng ·ªü ƒë·∫°i h·ªçc, n√™n c√°c b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ tin t∆∞·ªüng nh√©. M√¨nh c≈©ng tri·ªÉn khai th·ª≠ binary search v·ªõi bubble sort th·∫•y n√≥ bao qu√°t ƒë∆∞·ª£c kh√° nhi·ªÅu, bao g·ªìm c·∫£ v√≤ng l·∫∑p while, for, l√†m vi·ªác v·ªõi m·∫£ng.. (v√† debug m·ªát ngh·ªâ)))

Ch√∫c c√°c b·∫°n h·ªçc t·∫≠p vui v·∫ª, v√† c·∫£m ∆°n anh S∆°n v√¨ kh√≥a h·ªçc r·∫•t h·ªØu √≠ch !!!

posts.content:
### **3.3 Async/await (ES7)**


Async/await l√† c∆° ch·∫ø gi√∫p b·∫°n th·ª±c thi c√°c thao t√°c b·∫•t ƒë·ªìng b·ªô m·ªôt c√°ch tu·∫ßn t·ª± h∆°n , gi√∫p ƒëo·∫°n code nh√¨n qua t∆∞·ªüng nh∆∞ ƒë·ªìng b·ªô nh∆∞ng th·ª±c ra l·∫°i l√† ch·∫°y b·∫•t ƒë·ªìng b·ªô, gi√∫p ch√∫ng ta d·ªÖ h√¨nh dung h∆°n.

**3.2.1 Async**

ƒê·ªÉ ƒë·ªãnh nghƒ©a m·ªôt h√†m b·∫•t ƒë·ªìng b·ªô v·ªõi async, ta c·∫ßn khai b√°o t·ª´ kh√≥a async ngay tr∆∞·ªõc t·ª´ kh√≥a ƒë·ªãnh nghƒ©a h√†m.

Regular function:

```
async function getUser() {
    return ...
}
```

Function expression:
```
getUser = async function() {
    return ...
}
```

K·∫øt h·ª£p v·ªõi c√∫ ph√°p arrow function c·ªßa ES6
```
getUser = async () => { ... }
```
Gi√° tr·ªã tr·∫£ v·ªÅ c·ªßa *AsyncFunction* s·∫Ω lu√¥n l√† m·ªôt *Promise * m·∫∑c cho b·∫°n c√≥ g·ªçi *await* hay kh√¥ng, n·∫øu trong code kh√¥ng tr·∫£ v·ªÅ *Promise* n√†o th√¨ s·∫Ω c√≥ m·ªôt promise m·ªõi ƒë∆∞·ª£c resolve v·ªõi gi√° tr·ªã l√∫c ƒë·∫ßu (n·∫øu kh√¥ng c√≥ gi√° tr·ªã n√†o trong return k·∫øt qu·∫£ tr·∫£ v·ªÅ s·∫Ω l√† undefine). *Promise* n√†y s·∫Ω ·ªü tr·∫°ng th√°i th√†nh c√¥ng v·ªõi k·∫øt qu·∫£ ƒë∆∞·ª£c tr·∫£ v·ªÅ qua t·ª´ kh√≥a return c·ªßa h√†m async, ho·∫∑c ·ªü tr·∫°ng th√°i th·∫•t b·∫°i v·ªõi k·∫øt qu·∫£ ƒë∆∞·ª£c ƒë·∫©y qua t·ª´ kh√≥a throw trong h√†m async.

**3.1.2 Await**

V·ªÅ c∆° b·∫£n th√¨ *await* gi√∫p cho c√∫ ph√°p tr√¥ng d·ªÖ hi·ªÉu h∆°n, thay th√¨ ph·∫£i d√πng *then()* n·ªëi ti·∫øp nhau th√¨ ch·ªâ c·∫ßn ƒë·∫∑t await tr∆∞·ªõc m·ªói h√†m m√† ch√∫ng ta mu·ªën ƒë·ª£i k·∫øt qu·∫£ c·ªßa thao t√°c b·∫•t ƒë·ªìng b·ªô. Ch·ªâ d√πng ƒë∆∞·ª£c *await* trong h√†m n√†o c√≥ async ƒë·ª©ng ph√≠a tr∆∞·ªõc.
